SELECT t.no, t.user_no AS userNo, t.category_no AS categoryNo, t.type, c.name AS category_name, t.name, t.price, t.discount_rate, t.sales_count, t.thumbnail_path, t.sales_count, t.created_at FROM template t LEFT JOIN category c ON t.category_no = c.no WHERE t.is_deleted = 0 AND t.category_no = #{categoryNo} AND t.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')
AND t.price = 0 AND t.discount_rate >= 20 AND t.type = 'EDITOR' AND t.type = 'FILE'
ORDER BY
t.sales_count DESC t.price ASC t.price DESC t.created_at DESC
LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM template t WHERE t.is_deleted = 0 AND t.category_no = #{categoryNo} AND t.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')
AND t.price = 0 AND t.discount_rate >= 30 AND t.type = 'EDITOR' AND t.type = 'FILE'

SELECT t.no, t.name, t.price, t.discount_rate, c.name AS category_name, t.type, t.thumbnail_path, t.sales_count, t.description, l.name AS lawyer_name, l.profile AS profile, CONCAT_WS(' ', l.road_address, l.land_address, l.detail_address) AS full_address, l.office_number AS office_number,
'' AS short_intro, '' AS long_intro FROM template t LEFT JOIN category c ON t.category_no = c.no LEFT JOIN lawyer l ON t.user_no = l.no WHERE t.no = #{templateNo}

SELECT t.no AS tmpl_no, t.name AS template_name, t.type AS template_type, c.name AS category_name, toh.price AS price, toh.is_downloaded AS is_downloaded, t.thumbnail_path AS thumbnail_path FROM tmpl_orders_history toh JOIN template t ON toh.tmpl_no = t.no JOIN category c ON t.category_no = c.no WHERE toh.order_no = #{orderNo} AND t.type = #{type} AND t.category_no = #{categoryNo} AND toh.is_downloaded = #{isDownloaded}

SELECT t.no, t.name, t.price, t.discount_rate, t.category_no, t.description, t.thumbnail_path, e.content, e.var_json, e.ai_enabled, t.created_at FROM template t JOIN tmpl_editor_based e ON t.no = e.no WHERE t.no = #{templateNo}

SELECT t.no, t.name, t.price, t.discount_rate, t.category_no, t.description, t.thumbnail_path, f.path_json, t.created_at FROM template t JOIN tmpl_file_based f ON t.no = f.no WHERE t.no = #{templateNo}
